title: matchmaking system giving me the blues
body: has anyone in bronze5 noticed that you get a good team you can do something with 1 game then the very next the literal worst garbage who would lose to a game of bots...... ive never had this disparity so bad and its really getting me down.... what are some good ways to cope with this because i cant even win more then two games without getting the literal worst players ever the very next. i had great winstreaks last season but just can't get going atm :( and the lp gap is slowly closing .......

replies.body: you're a part of the literal worst players on this server tho...

cool story. 

3rd highest urgot mastery oce kappa

Which champion do have the 3rd highest mastery on oce .... oh wait its none

Dw about Mesprit he just likes annoying people on the boards, he has silver mmr and hasn't placed yet. Also even though I haven't noticed any problems with matchmaking, the state of bot lane basically means I have to camp top and hope that they don't feed cause it's so hard to get ahead.

Lol i dont mind my jimmies remain unrustled

Yeah.... pretty much all my games are decided by botlane
Glad to know I'm not the only one who notices!
